title: New: Noble Savage – Bloom
body:
Ah summer.

We spend six months of the year anticipating the arrival of summer, and the other six months complaining that ‘this is supposed to be summer’. How about for one year we just accept that we don’t live in the med, and enjoy the sparse periods of sun that we do receive? **Noble Savage**, a new project from Canadian musician Trevor Lang, appears to embody this very ethos, mixing tribal **Talking Heads**\-esque percussion with the disjointed warmth of Animal Collective. Check out _Bloom_ below. ([via](www.thisisfakediy.co.uk/neu/))
